mapper.insert: insert into DS_EP_USER (ID, QYBM, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, IDCARD, STATUS, USERTYPE, EMAIL, MOBILE, PHONE, WORKCARD, CAKEY, CREATETIME, SSDW, SSBM, FAX) values (#{id}, lower(#{qybm}), lower(#{account}), #{password}, #{name}, #{idcard}, #{status}, #{usertype}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{phone}, #{workcard}, #{cakey}, #{createtime}, #{ssdw}, #{ssbm}, #{fax})
mapper.delete: delete from DS_EP_USER where ID=#{id} and USERTYPE<>1
mapper.update: update DS_EP_USER set NAME=#{name}, IDCARD=#{idcard}, EMAIL=#{email}, MOBILE=#{mobile}, PHONE=#{phone}, WORKCARD=#{workcard}, CAKEY=#{cakey}, SSDW=#{ssdw}, SSBM=#{ssbm}, FAX=#{fax} where ID=#{id}
update DS_EP_USER set PASSWORD=#{password} where ID=#{id} and USERTYPE=#{usertype}
update DS_EP_USER set STATUS=#{status} where ID=#{id}
